1 from __future__ import print_function
2 
3 import argparse
4 import os
5 import sys
6 
7 
8 def main(argv=sys.argv[1:]):
9  parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(
10  description='Remove all test result files found within a given path.')
11  parser.add_argument('path', help='The path to recursively process')
12  args = parser.parse_args(argv)
13 
14  print("Removing test result files from '%s'" % os.path.abspath(args.path))
15  if not os.path.exists(args.path):
16  return 0
17 
18  for dirpath, dirnames, filenames in os.walk(args.path):
19  # do not recurse into folders starting with a dot
20  dirnames[:] = [d for d in dirnames if not d.startswith('.')]
21  for filename in [f for f in filenames if f.endswith('.xml')]:
22  filename_abs = os.path.join(dirpath, filename)
23  print("- removing '%s'" % filename_abs)
24  os.remove(filename_abs)
25 
26  return 0
27 
28 
29 if __name__ == '__main__':
30  sys.exit(main())
